transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan ji ji Manoj creation se baat kar rahe hain? 
Customer: Haan boliye madam.
Executive: Haan Manoj ji yes good evening kaise hain aap? 
Customer: Haan good evening badhiya sir aap? 
Executive: Sir main Sanansh Agrawal baat kar raha hun aap logon ka business manager India mart ke head office se. 
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Ji ji actually na Manoj creation karke aap logon ka ek profile hai hamare pass India mart pe listed hai profile se. Sorry. Sorry sir. 
Executive: Aap logon ka ek profile hai business profile India mart pe Manoj creation ke naam se jo India mart pe listed hai kafi time se right. Right. Actually Kavita ji hai jo aapki profile ki take care kar rahe hain. Haan right. To I guess aap logon ka unse koi interaction hua to aapne unka feedback negative dala hua tha not satisfied. 
Customer: Wo kya ho gaya actual mein main aapko batata hun ye mera abhi mere hisab se panchwa chatta account manager tha ye. 
Mere ko idea nahi hai. Account manager. Haan ye Kavita ji jo bhi hai. Thik hai to fir kya ho gaya Kavita ji mere ko phone to karte hain wo. Abhi kaisa hai har account manager aake mere ko same hi cheez puchta hai wapas se. Ki bhai aapke catalog mein ye hai aapke competitors ye kar rahe hain wo kar rahe hain main maine already sab kar chuka hun. Ab main pehle se unko yahi bol raha hun ki bhai mere leads matlab relatable nahi aa rahe hain. To wo log fir matlab same hi process ho raha hai ye sixth aaj matlab seventh time tha aaj. 
Executive: Main samajh gaya main ek kam karta hun main ab aapke liye ek kam karta hun. Agar aap agar aap ek ek ek minute ha agar aap matlab mera aisa request hai agar aap koi aisa banda de sakte ho mere ko jisko matlab thoda sa bhi mere business ke related knowledge ho. To help ho jayegi thodi si. 
Executive: Chaliye main ek kam karta hun aapka account manager change karke na jo aapka set account manager koi purana banda ho mere pass right wo main aapko allocate kara deta hun so that aap logon ki thodi si help bhi ho jayegi. Chalega. Ab usko kaisa usko sirf ye ye business ke andar na thoda sa knowledge chahiye bas basic ho jayega mera kam. 
Executive: Thik hai basic knowledge to main nahi keh sakta hogi ki nahi hogi but itna hai ki wo India mart mein purana hoga to wo aapko itni help jarur kar dega ki aapko kaise deal karna hai kaise nahi karna hai kaise nikalna hai chezo ko right aapke catalog at least enrich kar dega aapke competitors ki profile se uske basis pe fir aap apna business ko grow kar sakte hain. Okay okay thank you so much sir. Sir ek request tha aapka na main concern yahi pe close karunga aapke pass mere liye ek feedback aayega sir ki aapke catalog pe working kar rahe the to request tha sir mera feedback please aap share kar denge. Haan kar lunga kar lunga request hai thik hai na main aapko bas ek feedback mail bhejunga aapka ye number whatsapp pe hai? 
Customer: Ye hai na whatsapp pe dal. Main aapko apne sath whatsapp pe bhi add kar le raha hun in case agar aapko koi issue aaye koi problem aaye right to please mujhe bata dijiyega sir thik hai. 
Executive: Okay. Okay. Thank you so much sir main abhi account manager change karke aapko update kar dunga thik hai. 
Customer: Chalega okay thank you. Okay sir thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is getting irrelevant buyleads.

- Account managers keep repeating the same questions.

- Wants an account manager with business knowledge.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to change the account manager.

- Executive will assign an experienced account manager.

- Executive will add customer on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send a feedback mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, account manager, profile, feedback
